website_summaries.verdict: A premium brush for dry brushing benefits that combines quality design with well-textured bristles in an attractive box.
pros: This brush stands out because it has a good bristle texture that users praise, resulting in healthier, softer skin, lymphatic drainage, and better circulation
We love that it comes with a bonus facial brush and in stylish gift-worthy packaging
cons: Occasional users experienced issues with handle durability and a few were bothered by shedding bristles

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Fell to pieces and only a few months. Very disappointed in the quality. It was probably used 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good for just a minute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this body brush kit March 30th,?it arrived April 2nd. I have just started using it two weeks ago and have only used it a total of 7 times and by the 3rd day of use the base had cracked in multiple places and a lot of the fibers had fallen out. Other than that, it feels great against the skin. Just doesn’t seem like it’s going to be lasting more than a month or two. Too bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Soto.

customer_reviews.title: Great set and no harm to boars
customer_reviews.text: I love the set. It was delivered very quickly. This is my first time at dry brushing so the information that came with it and the instructions on the website were helpful. I found some other videos and info graphics on pinterest and from google searches too. I chose to purchase the set because of the good reviews and very importantly that the natural boar bristles were sustainably harvested and no boars were harmed. The wooden handles are smooth and easy to hold with the gripper around it. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: YogaGirl68

customer_reviews.title: The face brush is a little stiff but I have used it gently and it does do a good job of exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: Dry brushing is new to me. I had a massage at a spa recently and the masseuse suggested I try dry brushing. I looked online at the various web sites and decided to purchase the Spa Verde brush set. My skin is reacting in such a positive way. It is smoother and feels less dry. I even tried dry brushing my face. The face brush is a little stiff but I have used it gently and it does do a good job of exfoliating. But one has to be very gentle with the brushing on the face. Yet I do think it helps my moisturizing routine to absorb better. I would purchase this brush set again.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After much research and reading of reviews, I was excited to finally have decided on what I thought would be a great dry brush. However, when I opened the box, I could see a lot of lose bristles inside the packaging. Once I opened it and ran my hand across the brush, bristles steadily fell out. Sadly, I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC CRACKS AND IT LOOSES BRISTLES IN 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: At first, I really loved this brush. The bristles feel great, however it started falling apart after less-than 6 months. I ty to be careful about how I let the brush dry, regardless, the green plastic is cracking, releasing all the bristles into my shower. I am so sad that the Target version I bought lasted A LOT longer and was a better brush in the end.
customer_reviews.author: katoya

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this brush for about a year, and I have used it 3 times. Never once has it been wet, but I slowly have been noticing it lifting. I just now used it, and it literally crumbled on my back. This product is so poorly constructed it makes me so upset that I paid good money for garbage. I'm amazed by how high the reviews are its absolutely horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product!
customer_reviews.text: I recently received the dry brush set from SpaVerde. The brushes are exactly as described, I like them very much! The bristles are smooth enough not to scratch my skin, but firm enough to do a thorough skin brushing with. The brush and bristles are well made. I have been using them every other day for about two weeks. Dry brushing doesn't take very long and my skin feels and looks smoother. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you want the gift box
customer_reviews.text: This brush set comes in a giftable box. It is nothing special. I found the same brush in grocery store for less than $5(identical materials and handle only diff was handle was not removable). I tried to convince myself the flexibility of having it removable made it worth the extra $20 but since every time I want to use the long handle it pops off, I am using it as just the hand held which was also at the store for under $5. If I hadn’t used it I would have returned it. Not worth the $ IMO.
customer_reviews.author: krisfletch

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 months and about 15-20 uses this is what the brush I ordered looks like I bought this after shattering my hip so I could wash my lower legs and feet the bristles that have fallen out have caused nothing but headaches clogging my drain so using the brush isn't worth it anymore. I wouldn't recommend this product o anyone which is upsetting because I was really happy until the unexpected/unexplained cracking of the green part of the brush began
customer_reviews.author: VooDoo

customer_reviews.title: I have been pleased with the results from using them
customer_reviews.text: SpaVerde dry brushes! The package arrived on time. These brushes were made from quality materials that made me want to use them right away. I have been pleased with the results from using them. The brushes clean the dry skin from my arms and legs and feet and they feel softer and smooth after bathing. The Anti-Cellulite tools and oils seem to be working on reducing the lumpy skin. That makes me feel very pampered.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I am a red head and this felt very scratchy on my skin, but eventually I got kind of used to it. Then I got to my chest and face and it was hard to finish because of how scratchy it was. I thought the small face brush would be softer, but it wasn't, just smaller. Aside from this, it worked as expected. Some bristles falling out due to being new, exfoliated great! and felt the some of the detox relief I was looking for. I did make sure I did a hot/cold shower and a drank a bunch of water after, since detoxing was my primary reason for purchasing these brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Kammy

customer_reviews.title: This set of brushes is well made and very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used the brush about 4 times in the past month and it has been very effective at smoothing and softening the skin on my face, hands and body. When I use it I try to use light pressure so that it doesn't scratch my skin then shower and use oil or lotion to moisturize. My hands started to become dryer with the colder weather lately and I did an extra brushing on them with the face brush then used a good hand lotion and it has really helped with the painful redness and dry hands. I plan on purchasing another set for my wonderful cosmetologist friend who is always interested in improving hair and skin.
customer_reviews.author: D West

customer_reviews.title: Spa Dry Brush Set
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! If you are new to dry brushing like I am, it does hurt a little bit when you first start to use it. This is completely normal for dry brushes though, just apply slight to medium pressure is what I would recommend. Also, the handle that inserts into the brush takes a little bit of pushing to get it to properly go into the brush head, but other than that this product is wonderful! I will definitely continue to use this product on a weekly basis!
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy_Fark

customer_reviews.title: It's Fine (Backup to My Elemis)
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hold me over when I left my other brush in storage. It's not a bad brush. It just can't compete with my Elemis brush, which has firm(er) bristles and feels like it has more substance in my hand. This would make a nice starter brush for someone, and I do like the little face brush it came with.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Returned after one use...bristles falling out in clumps. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Rochowicz

customer_reviews.title: Works like you’d hope
customer_reviews.text: This brush does exactly what you’d need it to do. It feels a little rough at first, but I was happily surprised out how quickly my skin adjusted. This along with a deeply moisturizing lotion has helped turn my winter dry skin around. I like the fact that you can hold the brush head or put it on the extension because it allows for more control. I have been too chicken to try the small facial brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried it
customer_reviews.text: I tried this to help with my skins roughness but I’m just not a fan. You use before a shower so it gets dirty. I’m not sure if it works but I don’t like the concept.
customer_reviews.author: layah

customer_reviews.title: This product is not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I used it two days and dropped it in the shower a distance of 3-4 ft. The green base was crack and there were several bristles missing. What kind of product is this that cannot with stand a fell from that height. I have not used it since. Two days only!!!!!!! I have been busy at work, and have not had an opportunity to send it back. I will be sending it back. I would not send this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: gerald moore

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cracked and bristles falling out within first week of use :(
customer_reviews.text: My brush's plastic started cracking dramatically within the first week of use, causing bristles to fall out. Still useable, but very damaged. Quality of this product is questionable. Wish I had reported a concern earlier but got busy and lost track of time.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The strap frayed after the first use and by the third was no longer usable. The bristles themselves were good but overall would not recommend as not having a strap limits the ease of movement.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: ... so if you are buying this to exfoliate don’t waste your money but I do like the package and ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product because I wanted to exfoliate my skin and this brush do not help with exfoliate so if you are buying this to exfoliate don’t waste your money but I do like the package and the shipping was pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: India Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my wife at the end of May. Without a lot of use the green plastic plate on the brush it dry rotted and the brush bristles are falling out. She is not happy. She has used this product a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Little

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in combination with my Himalyan Pink Salt Scrub to exfoliate my skin and to remove the dead skin from my feet in the shower. Afterwards my skin feels wonderfully smooth and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Refine98

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: The facial brush is great. And you feel much more clean after use. Ive has those bumps on my upper arms and after using these, you can hardly tell they’re there. Nothing else has done that. I’ll define buying more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Good bristles
customer_reviews.text: I would revisit the design of this product if I were the manufacturer. I'd rather have one solid piece instead of the removable brush head. The bristles are good quality, the handle is strong, but the slot engraved for the brush is a bit crooked making it awkward to use when it's attached. It also slips off sometimes when using on your back.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service!
customer_reviews.text: Last week I wrote a review about how the brush I purchased was falling apart, and today in the mail I received a new brush! I was not expecting that at all, but I am so pleased with SpaVerde’s customer service, that I highly recommend this product! I’m excited to try my new body brush!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Toland

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. It's a little scratchy but not so much ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this about a week, so far so good. It's a little scratchy but not so much that it hurts or anything. I think it is supposed to be in order to get results. Not sure how long it takes to really notice results but I will update later as long as I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Karenjs

customer_reviews.title: feels good, but...
customer_reviews.text: The SpaVerde Brushes feel wonderful to use. I have not used them long enough yet to see any changes. After one use, though, there are 2 empty holes where a clump of bristles belong - they feel out after one use. While there are still plenty of bristle to do the job, and I realize a few bristles will fall out, it seems that this product shouldn't lose whole clumps of bristles. Otherwise I would give this product a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Mt Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good body brush
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived safe and in a good packing. Brushes are of high quality. The body brush was really good and serves it purpose. The small face brush felt a bit more rough for my skin on face ( maybe its just a problem for me and also b'coz its boar bristles ). Would have liked it a bit more soft for face as I don't like to be harsh on my face. Apart from that all good.
customer_reviews.author: JIBIN

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Started to fall apart after two days of ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Started to fall apart after two days of use.
customer_reviews.author: capt

customer_reviews.title: Quality bristles that are not too hard or soft
customer_reviews.text: Love the natural bristles and the clean wood finish. Very comfortable and not too abrasive.
customer_reviews.author: RESEARCH1

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife last year. It looked like she used it quite a bit. The rubber around the bristles started to break apart and it became quite warn looking. I asked my wife if she wanted another one. That's when I learned that she never used it.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Smoother skin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have very dry skin and have heard good things about dry brushing. I have used it only about 3 times so far, but I’m already noticing a difference in the texture of my skin. Smoother and softer. I’ve bought cheap brushes and obviously, didn’t like them so I went for one of the best reviewed products. And it was definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brown

customer_reviews.title: New to dry brushing
customer_reviews.text: I hadn’t done dry brushing before. But as my skin is aging, I wanted to try to take better care of it. So far, I’m enjoying how it makes my skin feel. The product itself is well made and of excellent quality. I like the little bag that comes with it so I can easily keep everything together and take it with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: CMandi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT brushes
customer_reviews.text: Really great for dry brushing! The bristles are firm but also soft, and feel really nice when applied with gentle to moderate pressure. I've been not only satisfied, but amazed by the quality of the product and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love these brushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these brushes, I seen a difference in my skin rather quickly, my skin has never felt so healthy. I use them right before I shower, the handle stays on well, I love that it is removable. No shedding of the bristles. The package was nice. All in all I would say if you are wanting to dry brush, this set is ideal. Pamper yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Walden

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. I feel it to benefit circulation and with the long handle places that are hard to reach are no more. Very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for keratosis pilaris
customer_reviews.text: Yes it works for what was needed. My daughter has those little bumps on her arms and cheeks, keratosis pilaris, and the dry brushing has helped. Her skin is clearer and softer. She does it every night. It can be a little harsh at first, but worth it. Just start out gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Andie F.

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the brushes and the design whic allows a detachable handle or handheld. I wish the bristles were a little more stiff but other buyers might not.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D

customer_reviews.title: Nice brushes
customer_reviews.text: Brushes are sturdy but lightweight so they're easy to use. The handle for the large brush is long enough to reach everywhere. The bristles on the facial brush are especially nice
customer_reviews.author: Kaye-ann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The bristles fall out immediately
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. I have used this only a few times and the Bristles have fallen out in chucks. There are complete bald spots on the brush. Not worth the purchase AT ALL. I am a massage therapist and have used other brands very similar to this for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amber F.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the brushes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the brushes, but was there supposed to be a long handle that I could attach to the large body brush? It shows one on the box, but I did not receive one. It makes it a little difficult to reach my back in certain spots.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this Brush the Plastic started to support from the main part of the brush..the bristles completely flattened and part of the brush completely fell apart. Very POOR Quality. Money spent....brush in the trash. CHEAP
customer_reviews.author: dkimmie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Brush Set!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this brush set!!! My skin has improved almost 100%. After using it for a couple weeks I noticed a few of the bristles had fallen out in one clump and the brush head had cracked. I immediately sent an email to the seller and she was so amazing and quickly sent me a replacement. Now that's EXCELLENT customer service. Thank You SpaVerde
customer_reviews.author: Merlot2006

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The bristles on this brush are really nice- you can feel them on your skin, but they don't hurt or scratch. That being said, the green hand strap comes apart AT LEAST once per use. You can kind of hold on to the brush without the hand strap, but then it gets in the way. The wooden handle also does not fit very snug, and often the brush head goes flying while brushing. I will probably be on the lookout for a better option and will just be calling this body brush a small financial loss.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta

customer_reviews.title: Great dry brush set
customer_reviews.text: I love the Spaverde dry brush set. It arrived on time and includes everything you need to start dry brush therapy. The brushes are excellent quality. I have used them 3 times so far. The company reached out to make sure the pkg arrived and that I was satisfied with my experience. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Evon

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this dry brush set again
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great. The natural boar bristles are just the right amount of toughness for my gentle skin. My skin feels noticably soft in just a few uses. My legs do t seem as ashy/dry. Quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: M&R

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Totally bummed this product is completely broken after 12 months of minimal use. Bristles fall out, brush is cracked. I’ve used it maybe 15 times total.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Nice brushes
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far can’t say I’ve used it a lot but seems to work like it’s suppose to
customer_reviews.author: Sher3

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation. You can tell the people put a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great presentation. You can tell the people put a lot of time and thought. But the bristles on the body brush are very coarse and hard. Even the lightest brush is painful and and extremely harsh on my skin. The face brush isn't as harsh so it makes me wonder if only the face brush has real hairs and the others are not. I'm not an expert.
customer_reviews.author: callmelyd

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Brush Set
customer_reviews.text: I like the brushes very much. They work great for dry brushing. The long handle is good for reaching my back. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: colorado sunrise

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the brush twice but I absolutely love the way my skin fees.. This may sound funny, but it made me feel like my skin was alive again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I am dry after my shower. tI feels wonderful on my skin and I feel invigorated after dry brushing. I really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: tygereye50

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the dry body brush and facial brush. Both feel good and do a great job in exfoliating and with blood circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Nice brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these brushes! Have been dry brushing for quite some time, the results are awesome. These brushes seem to be of good quality and this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H.

customer_reviews.title: A great product, packaged beautifully
customer_reviews.text: A great product, packaged beautifully. It’s obvious that the manufacturer cares about their product and customer. It would make a lovely, small gift for friends and or family.
customer_reviews.author: peter leitner

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing like an expensive massage!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the SpaVerde Natural Bristle Brushes for about three weeks. Brushing the full body doesn't take but a few minutes and it feels so good. Surprisingly there are even some emotional benefits. I am calmer than before and the tension that I have always held in my jaws seems to be relaxing a little. I have recommended dry brushing to several people.
customer_reviews.author: Jerie

customer_reviews.title: I’ll get back to you to see if the results are as promised by so far it’s great. I got one for myself and now everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: These dry brushes have already begun to change my skin, I have VERY dry skin and my skin is already getting softer and a huge plus I’m not so itchy because of the dry skin. I’ll get back to you to see if the results are as promised by so far it’s great. I got one for myself and now everyone in the house wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Invigorating to the skin
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy the invigorating feeling after using the SpaVerde dry brush. Loved the video explaining the right way to get the most benefit. The staff has been so customer focused. They are refreshing in this world of money and sales first and only. Thank you SpaVerde for such great personal attention.
customer_reviews.author: A Wig

customer_reviews.title: Your body needs it
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it! My face and body feel super soft after the brushing and showering. I notice that I don’t need to lotion up my legs and my arms as it used to be flaky. Planning to diy tonic treatment for my whole skin. A great collection to my skincare routine before showering.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Twi

customer_reviews.title: Great Dry Brushing Brush
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! Use as per instructions and you’ll get the best results too.
customer_reviews.author: Malina

customer_reviews.title: Long Handle Splinters Easily
customer_reviews.text: Long handle broke easily. Nice bristles & feels great when dry brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony R Hinnant

customer_reviews.title: Based on my personal experience...
customer_reviews.text: Great brushes for body and face. Using to stimulate lymphatic system and exfoliating skin. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: jsm

customer_reviews.title: like getting a spa treatment
customer_reviews.text: After the very first use of my new dry brush I was hooked! My skin felt amazing instantly like I was actually getting a spa treatment. I noticed a huge improvement in my skin immediately after my shower. I HIGHLY recommend this brush to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corie Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try dry brushing so ordered this brush and it works great! Product came quick and was nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality dry brush
customer_reviews.text: seems like a good set. I have only used them a few times so far though.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship, works great and the brush is well made. I haven't had anything fall off or tear up. I find it easy to use and it does help my skin stay less dry and helps absorb my body lotion. My skin has felt softer than it has in some time
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Helps with circulation
customer_reviews.text: Brushes are great. Have been using them every day. Usually in the morning or before a shower. I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: anaismama

customer_reviews.title: Rough
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about dry brushing but these are a little rough on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and like the face brush
customer_reviews.text: Great stylish brushes. I had never heard of a face brush for dry brushing so I was very excited to order this. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Hedy

customer_reviews.title: broken and awful
customer_reviews.text: this was all broken up, fibers were shedding, and it wasn't even hard enough to do a good dry rub. you're better off going to your local marshalls.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Made really good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my set it's well made, arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Adawnreed

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was very nice I will give you that
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was very nice I will give you that, however I opened the box and took out the brush and noticed the bristles were falling out. I have had better products elsewhere in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Holtman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I only used my brush 3 times and my brush is shedding It sheds coming out the storage bag and while using it I brought the brush because I know people who brought the brush and gave it rave reviews I’m upset that my brush is shedding the way it is
customer_reviews.author: Omeda J.

customer_reviews.title: Neuropathy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help with circulation in my legs & feet. Not very helpful but do like to use for stimulating my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality brushes. The facial brush didn’t come in the first package but after an email to and from the company, they sent one right out to me. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the brushes which are not to sify
customer_reviews.author: NerdyWoman

customer_reviews.title: If you have sensitive skin & it is very rough
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I would definitely buy it again. I love how my skin feels & looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this, but it hurts, and it takes forever, so I never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Elkazzaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great brushes, finely made. After a few weeks, seeing results already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This is way too abrasive for my face. The bristles aren’t soft at all and I feel like I’m just scratching my skin up. The larger body brush is also way too anrasive for me. These bristles are not forgiving whatsoever. I’m going to spend the money and get the Aveda dry brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Buescher

customer_reviews.title: A good product easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: A good product easy to use and clean. I have recommended it a couple of times already!

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter for Christmas. There were several sizes included. This shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Modesty B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: That's what happens after few use. Plastic portion broke and bristle are falling off. Very disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Wish the bad was just a smidge bigger, I feel like I’m cramming it in there.
customer_reviews.author: inu

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but brush will not stay attached to the long handle so using it on your back is impoi
customer_reviews.author: Elena S.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable/Honest manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this item. The brush arrived with a minor defect, but still got the job done. I contacted the company to confirm the defect. I received a response immediately, they confirmed it was a defect, & sent a replacement within no time; and no additional cost.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love my brush! It arrived fast! It’s great quality! I recommend this brush to anyone who is looking for an amazing dry brush experience!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this to my friends
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product's bristles are falling off after a couple of uses. I cannot recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Agan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brush Set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry brush set! I use it everyday before I shower. I love it so much I am giving the set as gifts this year to my friends and family. Customer service is amazing, they reached out to say thank you after buying the second one. I hope you love this as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Marvellous Dry Brushing Body Brush
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product. It's so easy to use, helps your body to feel at ease and really comes handy. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality brush very well made. Especially like that the handle can be detached from the bush head.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: really like
customer_reviews.text: have really enjoyed using this brush; seems to leave my skin feeling very fresh and vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Been using the body brushes for several days. It feels so good to brush. Product is as advertised. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out!
customer_reviews.text: This was great while it lasted but after using it ~5-6 times, the bristles started to slowly fall out. I had to throw it out because the dislodged bristles would stick to my skin and were very annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The green handle is torn and falling off the handle. The wooden handle end is also broken and will not connect to the brush. I was super excited and now I'm bummed that it seems like I was sent a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality brushes. If only I could remember to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Strong

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received product with almost all bristles falling off the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product **UPDATE: WAS a great product until it fell apart**
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product! Aesthetically pleasing! It does exactly what I bought it for! I use it in the mornings and it definitely helps me get going in the morning on top of the already great exfoliating that these brushes do! **UPDATE: It WAS a great product until it fell apart**
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

product_meta.title: Dry Brushing Body Brush - Natural Boar Bristle Dry Brush Set for Body and Face Brushing - Skin Brush that Revitalizes and Rejuvenates - Aids Lymph Flow, Alleviates Cellulite and Eliminates Toxins
feature_bullets: Exfoliate and rejuvenate your skin by using the SpaVerde dry brushing brush with natural boar bristles. Body brush for dry brushing that revitalizes and rejuvenates skin.

Get the full at-home spa experience with this complete dry brushing set, which includes a body brush, a face brush, a bonus storage and travel linen bag & easy-to-follow printed instructions. Great inflammation and swelling reducer - swollen feet and ankles relief.
We only use the highest quality, natural materials. And we back that with our 90-day money back guarantee.
Whether you’re looking to stimulate collagen production or improve your skin texture, dry brushing helps buff away dead skin cells to reveal healthier, younger looking skin.

Disclaimer: dry brushing brushes are only meant to be used dry, not wet, they are not shower brushes or bath brushes. Their bristles are supposed to be hard, otherwise the brush won't do its job, which is to exfoliate.
